name: Virginia Francis
summary: Capable Accountant successful at managing multiple projects and consistently meeting deadlines under pressure. Managed complex accounting functions and reconciled accounts involving multiple budgets and funding sources. Hands-on supervisory experience directing and training accounting and support staff. HR experience.

experience.title: Staff Accountant
experience.description: Responsible for monthly financials for seven medical groups, reconciling bank statements (including ZBA accounts), recording general ledger entries, payroll, transaction entries, month-end and year-end entries; reconciling balance sheet and income statement accounts; recording fixed assets and depreciation; reviewing financials for completeness, trends, and discrepancies; maintaining daily cash reports and cash flow spreadsheets; reviewing and processing accounts payable/receivable; preparing invoices; coordinating with payroll for medical and dental deductions; assisting with annual audit data; reconciling medical, dental, and COBRA with monthly statements; running monthly reports and creating special allocations and payroll reconciliations.

experience.title: Administrative Assistant
experience.description: Directed staff of three and managed accounting, budgeting, HR, and administrative responsibilities at a state-operated military academy. Assisted with staff hiring decisions and HR policies, administered federal/state budgets, completed quarterly reports, audited accounts, approved invoices, maintained petty cash, managed procurement contracts up to $25,000, created inter-agency service agreements, monitored WIA budget expenditures.

experience.title: Accounting Supervisor I
experience.description: Supervised five accounting staff handling accounts payable and travel transactions for nine divisions; reviewed and certified all AP and travel expenses in AKSAS; assisted with HR policies and procedures.

experience.title: Accounting Technician II
experience.description: Started as Administrative Clerk in 2002, advanced to Accounting Technician II in 2006; performed complex accounting adjustments across three systems; prepared detailed spreadsheets; improved productivity and reduced processing time; ensured payment of child support in accordance with court and administrative orders.
